messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Martha who?
messages.msgSnippet: A friend of mine gave me a subscription to that magazine for Christmas last year and I was so disappointed, it was so full of ads that i could not even enjoy
messages.messageBody:
A friend of mine gave me a subscription to that magazine for Christmas last
year and I was so disappointed, it was so full of ads that i could not even
enjoy it. I mean it said in one article that her socks costs 80.00(angora).
Really? to much for me.
Peace and love ,Tami(who is trying to get used to a new key board after an
attack of coffee on old but cooler one).

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Martha who?
messages.msgSnippet: Kerry Your gifts sound so awesome!  I wish I was a relative!  I don t see as much heart and thought in Martha s gifts anyway, yours are so creative. We made
messages.messageBody:
Kerry

Your gifts sound so awesome! I wish I was a relative! I don't see as much
heart and thought in Martha's gifts anyway, yours are so creative.

We made our gifts this year and had a ball. Unfortunately, none of them made
it into the mail on time (one of the kids got sick the night before our post
office day) but everyone understands.

Kris

messages.subject: Martha who?
messages.msgSnippet: I know, I know, shes a goddess. But, wait! I dont have a staff of 70 or the cashola to buy the stuff she does~! So, heres MY homeade goodies this year- no
messages.messageBody:
I know, I know, shes a goddess. But, wait! I dont have a staff of 70
or the cashola to buy the stuff she does~! So, heres MY homeade
goodies this year- no staff, low cost and full of love.
For the men- tie dyed boxer shorts
sis in law- hand painted broom, homeade celtic greeting cards(she
bought me celtic rubber stamps for my birthday back in November)
mom, mom-in-law, grammies---- scrapbook calenders (blank calenders
$3.00- filled with pics and pretties)
sis- cards, suede paper teddy in frame with pics of my boys holding
teddies she made them
niece-- celtic cards with the colors of her dance school
also, lots and lots of cookies, breads, candies for everyone! I even
gave some to the cashier at Walmart yesterday...... feeling so giving
and lovey now!!!
Kerry "Martha on a budget"
:)
